posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brett
Lot of 7 t206s for sale. The scans are kind of bright from my crappy scanner, but I can re scan them at your request ! Asking $180 for the lot. Insurance is extra. Would prefer to sell them as 1 lot, but i'll listen to offers for individual cards. The Crandell has a slight tear on his right chest and is a Factory 42. The white spots on some of the other cards are not pieces missing, just some paperloss. 

Thanks for looking [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG]
